column5: anyone out there aware of any navionics software (marine maps) that can be installed into any GPS unit?  I hear a company called Fujiyama makes excellent programs, anyone heard of them?
Yes, the Lowrance XOG can take the Navionics lake chips.  It's waterproof as well.
I think he is asking about a generic chip, that can go into any unit.
Depends on the software you want.  See Link below  http://www.navionics.com/DocLibrary/plotterfacts.pdf
LOL....I think you meant Fugawi,not Fujiyama.
hahaha yeah that the one! Fugawi, i read an article about there software last night. adn yes, lookin for generic software for any gps unit thanks again
